text: Pahoman Stadium is a football stadium which is also sometimes used for athletics in Bandar Lampung, Lampung, Indonesia. The stadium has a capacity of 25,000. Putra Sinar Giri F.C. and PS Hizbul Wathan are the tenants of the venue, which opened in 1977. == Stadium Condition == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Part ! title: Pahoman Stadium
